hero.heroImageAlt: An image related to freshwater ecology research, such as a lake or scientific equipment
hero.title: testing for youssup
hero.introduction: Welcome to thinIceProject, the official website for the research team led by Doctor Richardson. We are dedicated to studying freshwater ecology across the Hudson Valley region.
hero.description: Our fieldwork focuses on sampling and analysis in local bodies of water, including Lake Minnewaska, Lake Mohonk, and other critical small aquatic ecosystems in the area. Our articles below document our findings, methodologies, and progress.
